datasheets.name: Canoness Adalya

other.name: Lead the Righteous
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

wargear.name: Null Rod
wargear.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks.

datasheets.fluff: A veteran commander of vast experience, Canoness Adalya is a pious defender of the faith and a highly skilled warrior. A tactical and strategic genius, she leads the zealous warriors under her command with inspirational fearlessness and unbreakable determination.
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Battle Sister Squad ■ Celestian Sacresants
datasheets.loadout: ■ This model is equipped with: condemnor boltgun; hallowed chainsword; null rod.

datasheets.name: Battle Sisters Squad

special.description: Before the battle, at the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, this unit can be split into two units, each containing five models.
special.name: Patrol Squads

wargear.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
wargear.description: At the end of your Command phase, for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice with a value equal to that result.

datasheets.fluff: Battle Sisters of the Orders Militant are skilled and devout warriors. Wherever they advance, the light of the Emperor spreads like a holy down. Miracles manifest in their presence that turn aside the enemy’s strikes, or consume foes in fires of retribution as the Sisters cut down heretics with thundering salvoes from their boltguns.
datasheets.loadout:
■ The Sister Superior is equipped with: bolt pistol; combi-weapon; power weapon.
■ 1 Battle Sister is equipped with: boltpistol; Ministorum flamer; close combat weapon.
■ 1 Battle Sister is equipped with: boltpistol; Ministorum heavy flamer; close combat weapon.
■ 1 Battle Sister is equipped with: boltpistol; boltgun; close combat weapon; simulacrum imperialis.
■ 6 Battle Sisters are equipped with: boltpistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

datasheets.name: Celestian Sacresants

other.name: Sworn Protectors
other.description: While an Adepta Sororitas Character is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

datasheets.fluff: Part of the Celestian elite of the Orders Militant, Celestian Sacresants are close-combat specialists who - rather than serve as bodyguards - are charged with a holy quest. Whether that be to secure sacred relics or purge sites of the unclean, the Sacresants are relentless in their pursuit of victory.
datasheets.loadout: ■ Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; hallowed mace.

datasheets.name: Arco-flagellants

other.name: Extremis Trigger Word
other.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can choose to invoke its extremis trigger word. If you do, then until the end of the phase, arco-flails equipped by models in this unit have an Attacks characteristic of 6 and the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

datasheets.fluff: Arco-flagellants are fitted with cybernetic weaponry and subdermal stimulant pumps as punishment for past misdeeds. When battle commences, their bodies are energised by means of a trigger word and they are unleashed on the enemy. Any foe they reach they lash to pieces with cyber-implanted flails.
datasheets.loadout: ■ Every model is equipped with: arco-flails.

stratagems.name: Ascetic Discipline
stratagems.target: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 2.
stratagems.fluff: The Sisters of the Adepta Sororitas whisper mantras of concentration as they aim their boltguns towards the foe.

stratagems.name: A Martyr’s Death
stratagems.target: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not shot or fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if you discarded a Miracle dice when using this Stratagem. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can shoot or fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.fluff: Each and every Sister strives to strike one last blow against their foe before death claims them.

stratagems.name: Holy Radiance
stratagems.target: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against that attack
stratagems.fluff: The Emperor’s holy light illuminates these Sisters, its radiant aura bestowing upon them resilience just as it blinds the enemy with its shimmering brilliance.

enhancements.name: Defender of the Faith
enhancements.description:
■ Improve the Save characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit by 1.
■ In your Command phase, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. If you do, until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

enhancements.name: Righteous Fury
enhancements.description:
■ The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.
■ In your Command phase, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. If you do, until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.
